interpretation: The "memo" card represents the need to communicate important information. It suggests that you may need to jot down notes, send a message, or communicate with someone in order to stay organized and on track. This card may also indicate the need to pay attention to details and keep track of important deadlines. When this card appears in a reading, it may be a sign to take action and stay on top of things. Associated keywords include: communication, organization, details, reminders, and deadlines.
